objects.specification: A clean, flat classroom floor with a light-colored surface and a subtle matte finish, designed to provide a bright and inviting atmosphere. The floor material appears smooth and durable, suitable for high traffic. It has a uniform coloration with no visible seams or patterns, ensuring a minimalistic design that complements other classroom elements.

A smooth, flat indoor wall painted in pure white with a matte finish for minimal glare. It has clean edges and no decorative moldings, creating a bright and neutral backdrop ideal for educational environments. The surface is uniform, giving the room an open and spacious feel.

A sturdy teacher's desk featuring a rectangular top with a dark wood tone finish. It has thick, robust legs and a spacious surface for teaching materials. The desk design is minimalistic yet professional, featuring smooth edges and a rich, warm coloration that contrasts subtly with lighter elements in the room.

A teacher's chair designed with a complementary color to the dark wood desk, featuring a solid wooden seat and backrest. It has a sturdy metal frame with supportive, ergonomic contours. The finish is smooth and polished, offering both comfort and a professional appearance suited to the teacher's workspace.

A student desk characterized by a light wood tone rectangular tabletop with slender metal legs. It features a subtle wood grain texture and slightly rounded corners for safety. The desk has a minimalistic design with a smooth finish, providing an inviting and functional workspace for individual students.

A student chair crafted with a complementary warm tone finish on the wooden seat and backrest, supported by a metal frame. It is lightweight yet sturdy, with ergonomic shaping for comfort. The design is simple and consistent across all student seating, ensuring uniformity in the classroom.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a pure white writing surface and a slim aluminum frame. The board has a glossy finish that allows for clear marker visibility and easy erasing. Its minimalist design includes concealed mounting hardware, providing a clean appearance on the wall.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a sleek white casing. It has a small rectangular form with rounded edges and a smooth finish. The device includes a lens at the front and subtle ventilation grilles, embodying a modern, unobtrusive design suitable for classroom presentations.

A tall bookshelf crafted from medium-toned wood with visible grain details. It has multiple equally spaced shelves filled with assorted books of various colors and sizes. The bookshelf features clean lines and a sturdy construction, adding functional storage and visual interest along the wall.

A circular wall clock featuring a clean white face with black numeric hour markers and simple black hour and minute hands. It has a thin metal frame in a neutral tone, providing a classic and unobtrusive addition to the wall. The clock surface has a subtle matte texture to reduce glare.

A potted plant with lush green foliage comprised of multiple leaves arranged around a central stem. The plant sits in a simple ceramic pot with a neutral finish. It brings a natural touch and a burst of color into the classroom space, enhancing the environment with organic form and texture.

A rectangular LED ceiling light with a white metal frame and a diffused frosted glass cover. The fixture emits even, soft illumination across the room. Its design is modern and minimalistic, with a low-profile housing that blends seamlessly into the ceiling.

An educational poster printed on glossy paper, featuring colorful charts and diagrams. It has a thin border and smooth surface, designed to be informative and visually engaging. The vibrant graphics and clear typography make it an ideal decorative and instructional element for the classroom walls.

A small cylindrical waste bin made of neutral-toned plastic with a smooth surface. It has a simple open-top design and a sturdy base. The bin’s muted color ensures it remains unobtrusive while providing functional waste collection at strategic classroom locations.

A small cylindrical waste bin made of neutral-toned plastic with a smooth surface. It has a simple open-top design and a sturdy base. The bin’s muted color ensures it remains unobtrusive while providing functional waste collection at strategic classroom locations.

A large window composed of clear glass panels within a slim white frame. The window allows ample natural light into the room and includes subtle reflections on the glass surface. Its minimalist frame design creates a clean, unobtrusive opening on the wall.

A fabric curtain with a light neutral color, featuring soft folds and slight transparency. The curtain is partially drawn to allow light passage while adding texture to the wall. It has a subtle sheen and smooth drapery, enhancing the window with a gentle, decorative accent.
